block_comment: This block generates error byte signals based on comparison results and data validity for VIRTEX6 family with a burst length of 8. This is achieved by iterating over half of the data query pins, with an increment of 1 at each pass. For each index "i", if the incoming data "data_i" is valid and mismatches with the comparison data "cmp_data" at specific positions (8*(i+1)-1:8*i), the "error_byte" signal at index "i" is asserted.
